subject: RE: [Read_Alphabet] FW: Test of Kingsley font with Keyman program using J. F. Colson's mapping
msgSnippet: Saw the e-mail saying it did not work. Worked like a charm for my e-mail. I m using outlook with the Kingsley font installed on the system. It s good to be
messageBody:
Saw the e-mail saying "it" did not work.
 
Worked like a charm for my e-mail. I'm using outlook with the Kingsley font installed on the system. It's good to be mightily surprised.
 
luv it,
 
Ed

From: Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com [mailto:Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Paige Gabhart
Sent: Saturday, August 13, 2005 6:56 PM
To: read_alphabet@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Read_Alphabet] FW: Test of Kingsley font with Keyman program using J. F. Colson's mapping

 

Please let me know if the following comes through in the Kingsley font.  It is my understanding that browsers may cause problems with this sort of thing.  If it works, however, we could avoid the Ikonboard and the reported problems with spambots and still practice QS.

/pEJ
